section.name: Plugin Settings
section.p: Note that all of the torque.* properties that are defined for use in the build-torque.xml still apply here. This maven plugin just acts as a wrapper to delegate the torque:* tasks into a build-torque.xml.

tr.td: Specifies which build-torque.xml to use when calling the various Torque targets. Defaults to ${maven.home}/plugins/maven-torque-plugin-3.0-rc2-dev/build-torque.xml.
